name: Bitcoin Market Data Fetcher
description: This tool retrieves comprehensive, real-time market data for Bitcoin from the CoinGecko API. It fetches key metrics such as the current price in USD, all-time high, 24-hour trading range, market capitalization, circulating and maximum supply, and price performance over multiple timeframes (1h to 1y). Additionally, it provides Bitcoin's market dominance percentage.
author: @@official.shinkai

all_time_high_USD.description: All-time high price in USD, formatted as $X,XXX.XX

all_time_high_change_percentage.description: All-time high change percentage, formatted as +X.XX % or -X.XX %

all_time_high_date.description: Date of all-time high in Month Day Year format

circulating_supply.description: Circulating supply formatted as X,XXX BTC

current_price_in_USD.description: Current price of Bitcoin in USD, formatted as $X,XXX.XX

fully_diluted_valuation_in_USD.description: Fully diluted valuation in USD, formatted as $X,XXX.XX

high_24h_in_USD.description: 24-hour high price in USD, formatted as $X,XXX.XX

low_24h_in_USD.description: 24-hour low price in USD, formatted as $X,XXX.XX

market_cap_dominance.description: Bitcoin market cap dominance percentage, formatted as X.XX %

market_cap_in_usd.description: Market capitalization in USD, formatted as $X,XXX.XX

max_supply.description: Maximum supply formatted as X,XXX BTC

price_change_14d_usd.description: 14-day price change percentage, formatted as +X.XX % or -X.XX %

price_change_1h_usd.description: 1-hour price change percentage, formatted as +X.XX % or -X.XX %

price_change_1y_usd.description: 1-year price change percentage, formatted as +X.XX % or -X.XX %

price_change_200d_usd.description: 200-day price change percentage, formatted as +X.XX % or -X.XX %

price_change_24h_absolute_usd.description: 24-hour absolute price change in USD, formatted as +$X,XXX.XX or -$X,XXX.XX

price_change_24h_usd.description: 24-hour price change percentage, formatted as +X.XX % or -X.XX %

price_change_30d_usd.description: 30-day price change percentage, formatted as +X.XX % or -X.XX %

price_change_7d_usd.description: 7-day price change percentage, formatted as +X.XX % or -X.XX %

data.description: Dictionary containing Bitcoin data under a dynamic timestamped key
